Room.Name: Entrance to Etolos
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the entrance to the sacred druid dwelling known as Etolos.
Room.LongDescription: Etolos has been the historical gathering grounds for the great druids of the world. The druids are mystical people who have mastered the art of divine thought and healing. They pride themselves on their unwavering belief in nature and it's awesome power. It is rumored that even the grounds of Etolos hold mystical powers.
